title: Ticket #3883: No default settings for starter requierements
description:
In trying for a minimal config so we could look at know defaults in the internal tables, we failed until we had basic values for the following items: 

  DAEMON_LIST = MASTER, SCHEDD, STARTD, COLLECTOR, NEGOTIATOR
  RELEASE_DIR = /scratch/bt/outoftree/release_dir/
  LOCAL_DIR = /scratch/bt/outoftree/src/condor_tests
      /lib_param_completeness.saveme/23295/23295name1
  LOCAL_CONFIG_FILE = /scratch/bt/outoftree/src/condor_tests
     /lib_param_completeness.saveme/23295/23295name1/condor_config.local
  COLLECTOR_HOST = $(CONDOR_HOST):0
  COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE = $(LOG)/.collector_address
  NEGOTIATOR_ADDRESS_FILE = $(LOG)/.negotiator_address
  MASTER_ADDRESS_FILE = $(LOG)/.master_address
  STARTD_ADDRESS_FILE = $(LOG)/.startd_address
  SCHEDD_ADDRESS_FILE = $(LOG)/.schedd_address
  MASTER = $(SBIN)/condor_master
  STARTD = $(SBIN)/condor_startd
  SCHEDD = $(SBIN)/condor_schedd
  KBDD = $(SBIN)/condor_kbdd
  NEGOTIATOR = $(SBIN)/condor_negotiator
  COLLECTOR = $(SBIN)/condor_collector
  CKPT_SERVER = $(SBIN)/condor_ckpt_server
  STARTER_LOCAL = $(SBIN)/condor_starter
  STARTER = $(SBIN)/condor_starter
  STARTER_LIST = STARTER
  CONTINUE = TRUE
  PREEMPT =  FALSE
  SUSPEND =  FALSE
  WANT_SUSPEND =  FALSE
  WANT_VACATE =  FALSE
  START =  TRUE
  KILL = FALSE
  # minimal local config file
  CONDOR_HOST = ingwe.cs.wisc.edu
  COLLECTOR_HOST = $(CONDOR_HOST):0
creator: bt
